DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study explore benefit vibration dumbbell resistance train standard dumbbell resistance training improve upper limb strength , function pain among manual wheelchair user paraplegia .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Vibration Exercise Upper Limb Strength , Function , Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : The primary purpose study explore benefit vibration dumbbell resistance train standard dumbbell resistance training improve upper limb strength , function pain among manual wheelchair user paraplegia . Experimental Design : Randomized Control Trial Methods : Twenty-four subject paraplegia recruit randomize two group , vibration dumbbell training ( V-DT ) group standard dumbbell train group ( S-DT ) . Both group participate supervise 12-week ( 3 session per week ) dumbbell ( free-weight ) strength train program consist nine exercise specifically design improve upper limb muscle function support propulsion transfer activity protect shoulder develop pain . For nine exercise vibration group hold high-frequency ( 40 Hz ) vibrate dumbbell static arm posture ( isometric training ) control group move non-vibrating dumbbell full range motion give exercise ( isotonic training ) . Both group follow standardize protocol assess progress amount weight add dumbbell achieve optimal training effect . All participant participate laboratory test various outcome measure baseline , 6 week , 12 week 18 week ( i.e . 6 week post intervention ) .
DOC.criteria: neurological impairment secondary SCI T2 low great 1 year post injury use manual wheelchair primary mean mobility ( least 30 hr . per week ) 18 65 year age provide sign medical release primary care physician engage highintensity resistance training exercise program live within 60 minute drive time ( 1 hour ) research center able perform transfer independently wheelchair normal range motion upper limb . history fracture dislocation shoulder , elbow wrist subject fully recover joint replacement joint upper extremity upper limb pain interfere ability propel transfer current prior ( last 6 month ) participation structure resistance training exercise program recent hospitalization reason ( within past three month ) pregnant woman lack quick release wheel wheelchair ( require measure propulsion outcome ) history coronary artery disease , coronary bypass surgery cardiorespiratory event
